newsArray.title: Surrey and Reliance Industries Limited announce partnership in Oval Invincibles franchise in The Hundred
newsArray.description: Surrey County Cricket Club and Reliance Industries Limited – the owners of Indian Premier League side Mumbai Indians – have announced their partnership in the Oval Invincibles franchise in The Hundred.
creator: Tom White

newsArray.title: Virat Kohli Ruturaj Gaikwad creates History breaks Sachin tendulkar Dinesh karthik 15 years old Record
newsArray.description: विराट कोहली ने 93 गेंदों का सामना करते हुए 2 छक्कों और 7 चौकों के साथ 102 रन बनाए. यह उनके वनडे करियर का 53वां शतक है. वहीं,रुतुराज गायकवाड़ 83 गेंदों में 2 छक्कों और 12 चौकों की मदद से 105 रन बनाकर आउट हुए.The post Virat Kohli Ruturaj Gaikwad creates History breaks Sachin tendulkar Dinesh karthik 15 years old Record appeared first on Cricket Country.
keywords: virat kohli ruturaj gaikwad create history
virat kohli ruturaj gaikwad partnership record
sachin tendulkar dinesh karthik 15-year-old record broken
creator: Akhilesh Tripathi

newsArray.title: Veteran India pacer Mohit Sharma retires from all forms of cricket
newsArray.description: Mohit, who made his India debut in 2013, took 35 wickets in 26 ODIs and six wickets in 8 T20s. He was part of India’s 2015 ODI World Cup squad and later became a dependable death-overs option for Chennai Super Kings under MS Dhoni.
creator: Piyush Thapa

newsArray.title: Veteran pacer Mohit Sharma announces retirement from all formats of cricket
newsArray.description: Mohit Sharma, part of India's 2015 ODI World Cup squad, has retired from all formats. The Haryana pacer played 26 ODIs and eight T20Is and featured in 100-plus IPL matches

newsArray.title: The Hundred Franchise Oval Invincibles Renamed To MI London After Reliance-Surrey Deal
newsArray.description: Indian multinational conglomerate Reliance Industries and Surrey County Cricket Club on Wednesday announced their partnership in The Hundred and expectedly renamed the franchise to MI London. While the announcement was a formality, it did take a while for both parties to announce it. The majority of the agreements were announced in July.
creator: PTI
